definition: Lee Teng-hui (1923-2020), Taiwanese politician, president of ROC 1988-2000
plum
surname Li

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
splendor/to shine upon

sentences.english: The Confederate point of view swings back and forth from Lee to Longstreet.
sentences.chinese: 邦联的角度来看来回摆动从李登辉朗斯特里特。

sentences.english: Ex-Taiwan leader Lee indicted on graft charge.
sentences.chinese: 台湾前领导人李登辉涉嫌挪用公款被起诉。

sentences.english: Second, why is China so opposed to Lee Teng-hui visit the United States?
sentences.chinese: 第二个问题是，中国为何如此反对李登辉访美？

sentences.english: China considers Lee a leading figure among Taiwanese independence activists.
sentences.chinese: 中国认为李登辉是台独分子的首要人物。
